name: Polytrade
introduce: Polytrade is unleashing the locked-in liquidity within stagnant invoices, enabling worldwide SMEs to improve their working capital: typically in Trade Finance business, large pool of capital comes with constraints and restrictions on where to deploy the funds, due to regulatory or LP-linked constraints. Polytrade is able to take advantage of a distributed pool to deploy funds with higher flexibility, thereby reach and offer products and services in a context where competitors or other players still don’t exist.
